about_the_game:
A beautiful pack of art from Hidden Cats in Paris is available as a Coloring Book, including the Paris level and other 6 bonus scenarios. Also Coloring Poster with the huge Art of Paris level. Both are PDF files with printing resolution, but can also be used to make a nice digital painting on your preferred software.

A nice gift that you can get for family, friends, or yourself. Let's relax and stimulate our creativity, and share your paintings.
Meow, and this is a great way to support us!


Contents:
  • colorbook_hcparis.pdf (A4 page size)
  • poster_A0_hcparis.pdf (A0 page size)


After downloading, get the PDF files in the game directory where it is installed.

1 - Go to your library, find the game, and click the second mouse button.
2 - Click on Properties, Local Files
3 - Click on Browse

This will open the game directory and you'll see the DLC_Coloring_Book folder with the content.
